name: Frogger remake multiplayer
description:
This a frogger a game made with java, its had multiplayer only in french now.

English update and mods for the multiplayer mode and yes this is not the final game,

more frogs are comming ;)

To play in multiplayer go multiplayer choose how many players, choose port; the client has to select "rejoindre" and the port and click "lancer la partie"
